name: totteringly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If you walk or move totteringly, you walk or move in a way that looks as if you are about to fall over: She got up and walked totteringly to the front of the stage. He moved along totteringly, as though he had had too much to drink.
More examplesFewer examplesEventually I managed to stand up, totteringly at first but then a little more steadily.The fever made him walk feebly and totteringly.Many of the men and women walked totteringly, as if they were not in full control of their limbs.
